Parser.add_argument(r"""-v""", r"""--verbose""", action=r"""store_true""", default=True, help=r"""Print  extra output [default]""")
Parser.add_argument(r"""-q""", r"""--quietly""", action=r"""store_false""", dest=r"""verbose""", help=r"""Print little output""")
Parser.add_argument(r"""-c""", r"""--count""", type=int, default=5, help=r"""Number of random normals to generate [default %(default)s]""", metavar=r"""number""")
Parser.add_argument(r"""--generator""", default=r"""rnorm""", help=r"""Function to generate random deviates [default "%(default)s"]""")
Parser.add_argument(r"""--mean""", default=0, type=float, help=r"""Mean if generator == "rnorm" [default %(default)s]""")
Parser.add_argument(r"""--sd""", default=1, type=float, metavar=r"""standard deviation""", help=r"""Standard deviation if generator == "rnorm" [default %(default)s]""")

Parser.add_argument(r"""--mode""", choices=(r"""normal""", r"""uniform""", r"""binomial"""), default=r"""normal""", help=r"""The distribution mode to use. Choices are: normal, uniform, or binomial [default %(default)s]""")

parser_group0.add_argument(r"""--mode""", choices=(r"""normal""", r"""uniform""", r"""binomial"""), default=r"""normal""", help=r"""The distribution mode to use. Choices are: normal, uniform, or binomial [default %(default)s]""")

parser_group1.add_argument(r"""--mode_1""", choices=(r"""normal""", r"""uniform""", r"""binomial"""), default=r"""normal""", help=r"""The distribution mode to use. Choices are: normal, uniform, or binomial [default %(default)s]""")
